snippet: The Amnesty International report said that a group allied with the former president showed “cold-blooded disregard” in the killing of 14 people during a short coup last month.
abstract: Amnesty International investigates failed September coup of Burkina Faso government by Presidential Security Regiment, elite unit of ousted Pres Blaise Compaore; says their review of videos, medical records and interviews shows regiment shot, whipped or beat as many as 271 civilians and killed 14 unarmed noncombatants, including two children.
lead_paragraph: The Amnesty International report said that a group allied with the former president showed “cold-blooded disregard” in the killing of 14 people during a short coup last month.

headline.main: Amnesty Says 14 Civilians Were Killed in Burkina Faso Coup Attempt
headline.print_headline: Amnesty Says Burkina Faso Security Force Shot Civilians

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
